Perk.name: Summoner's Wrath
Perk.description:
Improves the following summoner spells:

Exhaust: Reduces target's magic resistance and armor by 10.
Ignite: Increases ability power and attack damage by 5 while on cooldown.
Surge: Increases ability power and attack speed gained by 10%.
Ghost: Increases movement speed bonus to 35%

Perk.name: Brute Force
Perk.description: Increases your attack damage by 1/2/3.

Perk.name: Mental Force
Perk.description: Increases your ability power by 1/2/3/4.

Perk.name: Butcher
Perk.description: Basic attacks deal 2/4 bonus damage to minions and monsters.

Perk.name: Alacrity
Perk.description: Increases your attack speed by 1.5%/3%/4.5%/6%

Perk.name: Sorcery
Perk.description: Increases your champion's cooldown reduction by 1%/2%/3%/4%.

Perk.name: Demolitionist
Perk.description: Basic attacks deal 10 bonus damage to towers.

Perk.name: Deadliness
Perk.description: Increases your attack damage by 0.5 per level.

Perk.name: Weapon Expertise
Perk.description: Increases your armor penetration by 10%.

Perk.name: Arcane Knowledge
Perk.description: Increases your magic penetration by 10%.

Perk.name: Havoc
Perk.description: Increases damage dealt by 0.5%/1%/1.5%.

Perk.name: Lethality
Perk.description: Increases your critical strike damage by 10%.

Perk.name: Vampirism
Perk.description: Increases your lifesteal by 1%/2%/3%.

Perk.name: Blast
Perk.description: Increases your ability power by 0.25/0.5/0.75/1 per level.

Perk.name: Sunder
Perk.description: Increases your armor penetration by 2/4/6.

Perk.name: Archmage
Perk.description: Increases your ability power by 1.25%/2.5%/3.75%/5%.

Perk.name: Executioner
Perk.description: Increases damage dealt by 6% to targets below 40% health.

Perk.name: Summoner's Resolve
Perk.description:
Improves the following summoner spells:

Revive: Grants a massive movement speed boost for a short duration upon reviving.
Cleanse: Increases duration of disable reduction by 1 second.
Heal: Increases health restpred by 15%.
Smite: Grants 10 bonus gold on use.
Garrison: Allied garrisoned turrets deal 50% splash damage.

Perk.name: Resistance
Perk.description: Increases your champion's magic resistance by 2/4/6.

Perk.name: Hardiness
Perk.description: Increases your champion's armor by 2/4/6.

Perk.name: Tough Skin
Perk.description: Reduces damage taken from minions and monsters by 1/2.

Perk.name: Durability
Perk.description: Increases your champion's health by 1.5/3/4.5/6 per level.

Perk.name: Vigor
Perk.description: Increases your champion's health regen by 1/2/3.

Perk.name: Indomitable
Perk.description: Reduces incoming damage by 1/2.

Perk.name: Veteran's Scars
Perk.description: Increases your champion's health by 30.

Perk.name: Evasion
Perk.description: Reduces damage taken from area of effect abilities by 1%/2%/3%.

Perk.name: Bladed Armor
Perk.description: Returns 6 damage against minion and monster attacks.

Perk.name: Siege Commander
Perk.description: Reduces the armor of nearby enemy towers by 10 (does not stack).

Perk.name: Initiator
Perk.description: Increases movement speed by 1%/2%/3% when above 70% health.

Perk.name: Enlightenment
Perk.description: Increases your champion's cooldown reduction by 0.15%/0.3%/0.45% per level.

Perk.name: Honor Guard
Perk.description: Reduces damage taken by 0.5%/1%/1.5%.

Perk.name: Mercenary
Perk.description: Gain 8/16/24 bonus gold on champion kills and assists (50% reduced effect on the Crystal Scar).

Perk.name: Juggernaut
Perk.description: Increases your maximum health by 3% and reduces the duration of incoming disables by 10%.

Perk.name: Summoner's Insight
Perk.description:
Improves the following summoner spells:

Teleport: Reduces cast time by 1 second.
Promote: Increases promoted minion's bonus defensive stats by 15%.
Flash: Reduces cooldown by 15 seconds.
Clarity: Increases mana restored by 20%.
Clairvoyance: Increases duration by 2 seconds.

Perk.name: Good Hands
Perk.description: Reduces the time spent dead by 4%/7%/10%

Perk.name: Expanded Mind
Perk.description: Increases your champion's mana by 4/8/12 per level or grants 4/7/10 additional energy.

Perk.name: Improved Recall
Perk.description: Reduces the cast time of Recall by 1 second and Enhanced Recall by 0.5 seconds.

Perk.name: Swiftness
Perk.description: Increases your movement speed by 0.5%/1%/1.5%/2%.

Perk.name: Meditation
Perk.description: Increases your champion's mana regeneration per 5 seconds by 1/2/3.

Perk.name: Scout
Perk.description: Increases vision range of wards by 5%.

Perk.name: Greed
Perk.description: Gain an additional 0.5/1/1.5/2 gold every 10 seconds.

Perk.name: Transmutation
Perk.description: Increases your champion's spell vamp by 1%/2%/3%.

Perk.name: Runic Affinity
Perk.description: Increases the duration of shrine, relic, quest, and neutral monster buffs by 20%.

Perk.name: Wealth
Perk.description: Increases your starting gold by 20/40.

Perk.name: Awareness
Perk.description: Increases experience gained by 1.25%/2.5%/3.75%/5%.

Perk.name: Sage
Perk.description: Gain 40 bonus experience on champion kills and assists (50% reduced effect on the Crystal Scar).

Perk.name: Perseverance
Perk.description: Increases health regen and mana regen by 3%/6%/9%.

Perk.name: Intelligence
Perk.description: Increases your champion's cooldown reduction by 2%/4%/6%.

Perk.name: Mastermind
Perk.description: Reduces the cooldown of your summoner spells by 15%.
